actions: The quad rone makes two fist attacks or four shortbow attacks.
*Melee Weapon Attack:* +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
*Ranged Weapon Attack:* +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
description: Astute combatants, quadrones serve as artillery and field officers in the regiments of modron armies.
name: Quadrone
traits: The quadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.
If the quadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.
